gen:link.msg:message: `AvailableForMemberPayments` SHOULD be equal to + `ResultBeforeMemberPayments` + `ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_AvailableForMemberPayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_AvailableForMemberPayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_ResultBeforeMemberPayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_ResultBeforeMemberPayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementCooperatives_PrtFST102Variables5_ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetRevenue` SHOULD exist at least once.
